entads.name: Heirloom Shocksword
entads.power: It’s electric. It's very mildly shocks anything which touches the blade, and a magical charge can be expended to create a stronger burst of electricity.

entads.name: Stride Boots
entads.power: They make the wearer's stride slightly longer, enabling slightly faster walking.

entads.name: Record Book
entads.power: The book transcribes everything people say nearby.

entads.name: Bookpack
entads.looks: a book, big and thick, nearly a foot and a half tall, with what had to be more than a thousand pages
entads.power: Each page is capable of storing a small item. Press the item into the page to store it as a drawing, annoted with a description of the item.

entads.name: Finger Flute
entads.looks: a flute with what seemed like far too many holes
entads.power: When in contact with a person's skin, that person has as many fingers as they need, and has the muscle memory needed to use all of their fingers effectively.

entads.name: Anyspoon
entads.power: With concentration, the wielder can change its shape and size, but it can never shift too far from being a normal spoon.

entads.name: Trauma Hanky
entads.power: While it covers a wound, that wound temporarily ceases to cause pain or impairment.

entads.name: Slow Bow
entads.looks: a white wooden longbow the color of bone
entads.power: Shooting an arrow creates a 10 foot bubble of slowed time that follows the arrow.

entads.name: The Flower Pot
entads.power: When the bottom is tapped twice, it lets out a beam of concentrated light that can blast halfway through a city.

entads.name: Mergan's Monocle
entads.looks: a monocle with a green lens
entads.power: It allows the wearer to read other languages.

entads.name: Mergan's Lockbox
entads.power: The entad takes some time and effort to open. It is used as a safe.

entads.name: Self-fetching Arrows
entads.looks: a set of arrows made of near-indestructable metal, slightly blunt
entads.power: After coming to a rest for one second, the arrows return to the person who shot them. This effect fails is more than four arrows are loosed at the same time.

entads.name: Dagger of Strategic Retreating
entads.looks: a small dagger, slightly dull, with a handle of jade
entads.power: Once per day, the person whom the dagger last cut can teleport to the location of the dagger. Anything the person is carrying is teleported along with them, up to some weight limit.

entads.name: Woods Walker
entads.power: It lets you walk through trees about a mile at a time but in a random direction.

entads.name: Doldrum Insurance
entads.power: Harnesses unseen winds.

entads.name: One-Way Ticket to Sprained Anklesville
entads.power: The wearer can jump fifty feet.

entads.name: Hearing Earings
entads.looks: a pair of earrings, jet black in the center with silver swirls around the outside
entads.power: slightly improved, omnidirectional hearing

entads.name: The Warp Wand
entads.power: It allows whoever holds it to teleport anywhere they can think of as often as they please.

entads.name: Recall Statue
entads.power: Alfric's mom can teleport to it from anywhere in the world.

entads.name: Pond Hopper
entads.power: Allows the wielder to teleport from one fountain to another.

entads.name: Full Orchestral Lute
entads.power: This lute can produce the sounds of an entire symphony orchestra. Each instrument is played with skill equivalent to the wielder's skill at the lute. It's very mentally taxing to play.

entads.name: Gillgamesh
entads.power: Gave gills to Alfric's Uncle

entads.name: Jingu Bang Junior
entads.looks: a wooden staff, so natural that it might have been possible to mistake for a branch
entads.power: The staff can change in length, and it ehances the wielder's balance.

entads.name: Soggy Sword
entads.looks: a sword covered in seaweed, rust, and barnacles, with the metal chipped and cracked
entads.power: The sword is constantly damp, and it lets the wielder breathe water. Any water exhaled will surround the wielder as a barrier, protecting them from attacks. It only protects you from underwater attacks though, and isn't very useful as a weapon.

entads.name: Warping Wardrobe
entads.looks: a piece of large oak furniture with a curious dial set into its front
entads.power: After the dial is set, the interior of the wardrobe opens a one-way portal to an adjacent hex.
entads.owner: The Party, though kept in Bethany's shop in Pucklechurch.

entads.name: The Vibe Checking Fidget Flipper
entads.looks: a big coin, almost a big across as a hand
entads.power: The coin gives some measure of emotional understanding of the people around you. While flipping it, it makes you feel good if the people nearby are good (for you, in some vague non-specific way), and it makes you feel bad if they are bad. Mind-reading effects are incredibly rare, so the coin is extremely valuable despite its limitations.

entads.name: Slipknot
entads.power: The rope slides in place with the ends moving.

entads.name: Clerical X-Ray Specs
entads.power: Let's the wearer see inside of people, and highlights the parts of their body that have been magically changed.

entads.name: Rock Garden
entads.looks: a pale rock with lots of holes
entads.power: It allows access to an extra-dimensional space which can be used to store organic material and stone.

entads.name: Backstabber
entads.power: It lets you know how aware of you someone is.

entads.name: Topo Table
entads.looks: a table, nearly four feet across, six feet long
entads.power: The surface of the table forms a map of the region, including 3d terrain.

entads.name: Instadinner
entads.power: When the cloche is lifted, you'll find a hot meal waiting for you.

entads.name: Everpencil
entads.power: Never runs out of lead.

entads.name: Matchmaker
entads.power: It can make matches out of plain sticks.

entads.name: Pocket Puff
entads.power: Can change size.

entads.name: Universal Dictionary
entads.power: Gives you the definition of any word spoken aloud, with made-up definitions for made-up words.

entads.name: Springblock
entads.power: Hops around like a frog.

entads.name: Adder All
entads.power: Can do sums.

entads.name: Coiffeur Clip
entads.power: Can do your hair in various complicated braids.

entads.name: Armor of the Beholder
entads.power: Anyone who strikes it will inhabit the wearer's viewpoint for one minute.

entads.name: Non-Newtonian Shirt
entads.power: Goes rigid as steel if you try to pierce it.

entads.name: Grandma's Aegis
entads.power: Leeps you warm in a snowstorm.

entads.name: Bug Blastin' Britches
entads.looks: A pair of pants, only large enough for a child.
entads.power: Kills any bug that gets within ten feet of it.

entads.name: Extendo-spear
entads.looks: Thin, red, and with a gilded tip.
entads.power: Extends to eight times its length, exerting force while extending, and extremely difficult to destroy.

entads.name: Jerk Dirk
entads.looks: Like an enlarged toothpick, pointed on both ends and made of wood.
entads.power: Penetrates the opposite side of whatever it touches and can teleport the wielder.

entads.name: Isra's Bottled Garden
entads.looks: a bottle, no larger than a cabbage
entads.power: When a seed is dropped into it, the seed shrinks down and grows into a miniature plant within a day. Can be used to get oranges in the winter.
entads.comment: stolen and sold to a shop far to the east, in a town on the shore of Lake Galia, recovered in chapter 86

entads.name: Isra's Silent Dagger
entads.power: The dagger goes through the air like a whisper.

entads.name: Fire Axe
entads.power: It can burst into flames at the head.

entads.name: Better Fingers
entads.power: Gives the wearer better finger dexterity.

entads.name: Bracers of Strength
entads.power: Doubles the wearer's strength.

entads.name: Splatter Platter
entads.power: Can reassemble itself after being broken.

entads.name: Mercurial Raiment
entads.looks: A silvery suit of armor with good craftsmanship but no filigree.
entads.power: Can morph itself around the weapon of the wearer, if they are wielding one, making it larger but remaining easy to wield.

entads.name: Wand of Refurbishment
entads.power: Stores an object inside, and returns the object with several subtle alterations. It doesn't change an entad's effect, but can interfere with active effects. Don't use it on a person; that would be murder.

entads.name: Stone Ring
entads.looks: A ring, dark and iridescent, like a beetle's shell, with geometric lines on the outside and indecipherable writing on the inside.
entads.power: Turns the wearer to stone.

entads.name: Puzzling Placard
entads.looks: A paper card with indecipherable writing on it.
entads.power: Gives a brief description of the provenance of an item, including only the most relevant information, but the language it uses is unique to the item.

entads.name: Unweighted Blanket
entads.power: Removes the weight of everything completely enclosed in it.

entads.name: Party Peering Parchment
entads.looks: A map with an unreadable legend.
entads.power: When the compass rose is tapped thrice, it shows a map of the immediate area, as well as any parties within it.

entads.name: Plutonian Poker
entads.power: The bident is impeccable in terms of durability, which is good, because it generates an enormous amount of power (in explosion form?) between its tips. The amount of power increases with the size of the thing which was stabbed.

entads.name: Marsh's Marvelous Telefinglonger
entads.power: This entad allows the user to touch things far away by partially and temporarily teleporting their fingers.

entads.name: Marsh's Marvelous Swampmaker
entads.power: It makes trees wet.

entads.name: Ring of Bathing
entads.power: With a twist, the ring coalesces all the filth on the wearer's body into little inch-tall filthmen, who run a few feet away and then collapse with a splash.

entads.name: Ring of Internal Anatomy
entads.power: It grants the wielder insight into the anatomy of other creatures, including the most effective place to stab them.

entads.name: Reviewing Window
entads.power: Looking through the glass reveals what happened exactly three hours ago.

entads.name: Hashtag Aesthetic
entads.looks: a chain necklace with a little twelve-sided copper pendant, paired with a mannequin
entads.power: Whoever is wearing the necklace gets all the benefits of wearing whatever is placed on the mannequin.

entads.name: The Carver
entads.looks: a wooden case, about as wide as a man's chest, filled with hundreds of tools
entads.power: The case offers a boost to woodworking and multitasking, and the tools can swarm around a log like bees around sugar water.

entads.name: Wand of False Pygmalion
entads.power: When pressed to a statue of someone, the wand swaps the positions of that person and their statue.

entads.name: Wee Alfric's Sailor Door
entads.looks: a door of light wood stained blue, nearly teal
entads.power: The door acts as a portal, connecting the Overguard House to a fishing town by the sea. The door has a limited number of uses before locking people out, with uses refreshing according to the tides.

entads.name: Kyrie's Creepy Voodoo Door
entads.power: The door acts as a portal, connecting the Overguard House to somewhere else. To pass through the door, you must sacrifice a bone of a species native to the place you are going to.

entads.name: Prismatic Guest Rooms
entads.looks: a door and a dial, covered in colors
entads.power: The room can be split into 17 differently colored copies of itself or collapsed back together into a single room. While split, the dial controls which version of the room the door accesses.

entads.name: Cozy Drudgery Portals
entads.looks: a pair of magical doorways, or rather a quartet
entads.power: The blue pair of doors are magically connected via a portal, as are the pair of yellow doors. The portal system of the entad set is rate-limited by weight, but with such a high limit that it can safely be ignored.

entads.name: Red for Green Door
entads.power: The doorway acts a magical portal between two distant locations. To remain functioning, it requires a monthly goat sacrifice.

entads.name: Huant Jaunter
entads.power: The doorway acts as a portal connecting the Overguard House to the far south. But while on the other side of the door, you are rendered ghostly.

entads.name: The Overguard Family Vault
entads.looks: a five-floor vault, filled with all manner of entads
entads.power: The vault has no door; only those keyed to the vault (and their guests) may enter. The myriad entads stored inside tend to be bound or have second-rate effects.

entads.name: Plasticowl
entads.power: The wearer's face can be rearranged clay. Care must be taken not to sneeze or bump into things, lest unintentional deformation occur.

entads.name: Foggy Fedora
entads.power: It's face-obscuring. When worn, it makes a faint humming noise and the wearer's face looks blurry.

entads.name: Ring of Cosmetic Alteration
entads.power: The wearer can change their eye color, skin color, hair color, hair length,  or hair texture. Changes revert upon removal of the ring.

entads.name: Macho Pancho
entads.power: While worn, it gives the wearer a beard and flattens their breasts.

entads.name: Cotton Hill Special
entads.power: It makes the wearer shorter by temporarily removing a chunk of their legs.

entads.name: Unbiggen Bangle
entads.power: It makes the wearer proportionally smaller. It's nothing super dramatic, just enough to shrink Verity to Mizuki's size.

entads.name: Wand of Dye
entads.power: When used on a person, it changes their hair-color for 24 hours. The wand samples colors from nearby wigs.

entads.name: Tabula Plaza
entads.looks: A large table with a recessed dial on the size.
entads.power: Twisting the dial warps space around the table, ensuring that there is always enough room for everyone to take a seat.

entads.name: The Overguard Dining Collection
entads.looks: a motley collection of plates, cups, glasses, mugs, bowls, platters, forks, knives, spoons, and a few things only a dungeons would ever have made for eating with
entads.power: This collection of seventy-eight entads is used by the Overguard family to feed and entertain guests. Fifty of the entads are capable of producing food of some kind, and twenty or so are capable of giving you the best meal of your life. Individual entads in this collection are detailed in their own entries.

entads.name: Not-too-hot Plate
entads.power: It keeps your food the perfect temperature.

entads.name: Fjork
entads.power: By thinking really hard, you can wiggle the fork's tines.

entads.name: Polite Platter
entads.power: It makes you a meal when you speak aloud to it.

entads.name: Speak 'n' Scoop
entads.power: It summons a morsel of food for you when you speak aloud to it.

entads.name: Floating Fork
entads.power: It has the ability to self levitate.

entads.name: Smooth Eatin'
entads.power: It can fill with any homogeneous liquid the user desires.

entads.name: Bangarang Banquet
entads.looks: a white plate with blue glaze
entads.power: When the user imagines eating food from this plate, the imaginary food becomes real as they lift it towards their mouth.

entads.name: The Alfric Overguard Diet Plan
entads.power: It can summon incredibly bland, nutritious food.

entads.name: Spice Equalizer
entads.power: When used to eat food, it heightens the taste of that food in proportion to how bland it is.

entads.name: Picky Eater's Trick Plate
entads.power: It summons a complete meal, but the eater must eat in proportion: one bite of meat, then one of noodles, then one of vegetables. If the user tries to take multiple bites in a row from the same item, the food becomes as solid as stone.

entads.name: Ring of Flight
entads.power: It lets the user fly. It apparently takes some skill to use, as Alfric's brother Mo broke his leg playing around with it.

entads.name: The Everyfork
entads.power: It copies the entadic abilities of whatever other silverware the wielder is holding.

entads.name: The Overkill
entads.looks: It's like a sword-shaped hole in the world, the long curved blade visible only by what is missing. It does something to the eyes, the blackness reaching into the mind, erasing any sensation of light, even for things that are in front of it.
entads.power: The sword can disappear into nowhere and be recalled by it's user. It slowly drains the user's blood, but pays that blood back with interest in case of injury. It voids matter which the blade touches. When pointed at a creature, the blade indicates their most vulnerable spots. While the blade is moving towards an enemy, it multiplies the perception, speed, and force of the wielder are magnified ten-fold. Multiple enemies can be designated, and if they have similar physiology, then when the blade wounds one of them, it wounds them all.

entads.name: Knuckle Buster Wand
entads.power: When used, it creates a rock out of thin air, but also cuts off all fingers in a fifty yard radius.

entads.name: Modiviper
entads.looks: a measuring tape which slithers through the air
entads.power: The tape can can resize any dress to fit whomever was just measured.

entads.name: An Embarrasment of Riches
entads.looks: various bracelets, rings, necklaces, and earrings
entads.power: Their powers are nothing you’d need to worry about. Alfric's mom just lent them out as accessories.

entads.name: Just Five More Minutes
entads.power: It slows down time within a room.

entads.name: Homermatic Cosmetics Blaster
entads.power: It applies makeup in a matter of seconds.

entads.name: The Flame Dress
entads.looks: A red dress, one that almost seems to be made of a single large sheet of fabric, gathered together at the front so that it forms a V at the chest and a second, upside down one by the legs. It ends up with something like a cape in the back, the fabric draping low, almost touching the floor. At the shoulders there's a fluffy fabric, like non-functional pauldrons.
entads.power: With a snap of the wearer's fingers, the dress transforms to magical flame.

entads.name: Fuccboi's Foil
entads.power: The rapier can be summoned to one's hand with a flourish.

entads.name: The Protection Collection
entads.power: Taken together, these entads have the following effects when activated: They coat the user in a set of skintight black armor, decorated with thin gold lines, and complete with a tasteful codpiece. They make the user grow two feet taller. They summon a gleaming six-foot-long sword and grant the user the strength to wield it. And they grant the user supernatural precision when swinging a blade.

entads.name: Window on the Worlds
entads.looks: a windowframe with two dials on the side
entads.power: The window shows an alien view. One dial changes the bizaro weather, while the other dial changes the bizaro landscape.

entads.name: Tiradito Tines
entads.power: The fork can create raw seafood on its tips.

entads.name: Sampler Summoning Saucer
entads.power: The bowl could make very small amounts of food, no more than a single bite, but couldn’t do the same food twice within a month.

entads.name: Marsh's Marvelous Marble
entads.power: When Marsh wishes it, the marble grows warm. If someone then squeezes the marble, an animated temporary tattoo of Marsh appears on their arm, which can be used to remotely communicate with Marsh.

entads.name: The Milk Juggernaut
entads.power: It has the ability to make milk, but in such great quantities that it's one of the most valuable entads in the city.

entads.name: Kupferkarte
entads.looks: a copper amulet, encrusted with verdigris
entads.power: The amulet dynamically maps its surroundings out to ten feet. The map is visible only to the user, can be called up with a mental push, and mapped objects remain for 2 days. It's monochrome and low fidelity, though.

entads.name: Ding Door
entads.looks: an oversized cauldron tipped on its side
entads.power: The cauldron acts as a magical doorway, currently being used to connect Dondrian Central Station to the neighborhood of Lakeside.

entads.name: The Hie Dissapointment
entads.looks: something too big to remove from a dungeon without taking it apart
entads.power: The effect of this entad is unknown, but it was good enough to make the thing worth a hundred thousand rings.

entads.name: The Shidduchinator
entads.power: It attempts to read into the fundamental natures of a pair of people, and determines whether they will be good matches for one another. It's supposedly at the upper end of what such entads can do, but still misdiagnosed Alfric and Lola as being good for one another.

entads.name: Rusty Arrow Bow
entads.looks: a blood-red and shiny bow, so large that it was taller than Mizuki(?)
entads.power: It rusts things the arrows strike.(?)

entads.name: Envious Bow
entads.looks: a bow made of caramel-colored wood that was sanded matte(?)
entads.power: It is half as strong as the last enemy it has killed.(?)

entads.name: Hamma Barbera
entads.power: It flattens biological things without hurting them.

entads.name: Trick Arrow Bow
entads.power: Unwieldy projectiles can be launched, transforming into an arrow at the moment of release. If such a transformed object is launched with the bow, it will revert back to its original form.

entads.name: Bow Against Arrows
entads.power: It gives a defense against arrows.(?)

entads.name: Fjork 2: Fjork to the Max
entads.power: The holder can form a mental link with the fork. Through this mental link, the forks tines can be commanded to change in length or move like tentacles. The link doesn't require continued contact, and so the fork can be puppeted to gambol about like a newborn deer.

entads.name: Freezing Fork
entads.power: While the fork is stabbed into a piece of meat with it, the meat very slowly freezes.

entads.name: Bashfully Big Bowl
entads.power: It holds more liquid than it should. Any liquid poured in above a certain level spills into an extradimensional reservoir. It's unknown how big the reservoir is - probably just a gallon or so.

entads.name: Spear of Conscientious Objection
entads.power: When you try to stab something with it, it bends in the middle.

entads.name: Cuppy Cup Cupperson
entads.power: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way this cup should be able to function as a throwing weapon. The cup, of course, kills things anyways because cups don't care what humans think is impossible.

entads.name: Triple Shot
entads.power: The wielder's accuracy is enhanced. The bow simulates three shots, and makes real the one which is best.
entads.comment: As with all the entad bows, it is unclear which power is associated with which bow.

entads.name: Clean Stitch
entads.power: When fabric is pierced with this needle, any thread attached to the needle changes to match that of the fabric.

entads.name: Nimble Bhimble Armor
entads.power: When the thimble is placed on a thumb, it slowly expends to generate full body metal armor. The armor is supernaturally flexible and breathable, and can very slightly shift forms.

entads.name: Chester the Clingy Chest
entads.looks: a large wooden chest with clawed feet, artistically made, with tin panels on the top sides which are embossed with scenes of the conservatory
entads.power: It follows the party around indiscriminately. If there are no party members outside of it within five feet, it proceeds to the nearest party member at a jaunty trot. It has supernaturally sure footing, and can scale steep slopes. It can travel at incredibly speeds while nimbly avoiding obstacles.

entads.name: Absorbing Board Sword
entads.power: Anything the sword touches, it can temporarily take on the attributes of, with the time lasting for a day. It can also draw in ambient conditions (air, water, heat) and later expel them, though the effect is weak.

entads.name: Weightless Winged Helm
entads.looks: a metal helm with wingaling designs over the ears
entads.power: The helm renders the wearer effectively weightless, and allows the wearer to float through the air at a brisk pace.

entads.name: Undercover Bedroom
entads.power: It allows access to a very small extradimensional room. It is only just big enough for a bed, and cramped if the occupants are doing anything but laying there together, but it is cozy most of the time, and inside it, their privacy is almost absolute.

entads.name: Barely Magical Tent
entads.looks: a large tent, big enough for a stove, chiller, and five hammocks

entads.name: Constitute Lute
entads.power: It can create the sounds of eight lutes simultaneously. It self-tunes, and is waterproof and very durable.

entads.name: The Pile of Trifles
entads.looks: a collection of hundreds of entads
entads.power: The entads all have very minor effects.

entads.name: The Seeker of Secret's Stuff
entads.looks: robes so long that they seem impractical
entads.power: Their powers are unknown, but they might let the wearer hover slightly off of the ground.
entads.comment: Cate's necklace might also be an entad.

entads.name: Frustrating Flight Flute
entads.power: The flute can awkwardly levitate the wielder, but only while they are actively blowing into it.

entads.name: Blendtek Gigablender
entads.power: It instantly homogenizes anything that goes past the rim, including spoons and fingers.

entads.name: Week Inker
entads.power: The pen can write on skin, with the ink staying there, indelible, for six full days.

entads.name: Reversible Blade
entads.power: Anything cut with this dirk can be easily mended simply by holding the two halves together.

entads.name: Kell's Shooting Star
entads.looks: an amulet with the pattern of a sun on it
entads.power: Kell can teleport to the amulet twice a day. He can bring up to 150 pounds of organics and 50 pounds of inorganics.

entads.name: Kell's Star Shooter
entads.power: The slingshot imparts some sort of weird physics on its projectiles, partially nullifying the effects of gravity and friction. As such, the projectiles can travel almost fifty miles. The slingshot also grants the wielder insight about where they are aiming.

entads.name: Bottled Arms
entads.power: The user can make their limbs temporarily vanish.

entads.name: The Menger Mansion
entads.looks: a large cubical house with cube-shaped rooms
entads.power: It can create any object composed of perfect cubes, with the strengths of the entad being related to how large and perfectly composed the cubes are. The created objects are self-cleaning.

entads.name: Trans-species Shapeshifter
entads.power: The wearer can change their appearance to look like anyone, as long as that person isn't the same species as the wearer.

entads.name: Ring of Disguise of Some Sort
entads.power: The wearer is diguised as a normal looking bloke. The appearance of the disguise is the same for every user.

entads.name: Soylent Circlet
entads.looks: a ring the size of a bracelet
entads.power: It extrudes protein in the form of meaty pucks.

entads.name: Penne Painter
entads.power: The tip of the brush leaves summoned pasta in its wake.

entads.name: Magical Mirepoix Maker
entads.power: Tiny roasted vegetables fall out of the shaker and expand to full size once they land.

entads.name: NAME
entads.power: POWER
